Lines.Speech: [i]You look upon the Mandaryan Crystal, only possible by the dark visor Glados deemed to activate upon many, _many complaints.
[i]Nearby, _charred bodies lie motionless in a semi-circle around the crystal. Looks like those before you were _ill equipped _to handle this thing.
[i]Taking the golf ball sized crystal into your hands, the metal suiting starts to sizzle as you deposit it into a container at your waist.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: DAAAMN THAT'S H_O_T_! _Glad we were given the container otherwise you'd have no hands before we got back to the surface.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Alright, back to the surface ASAP. The longer we wait, the more energy is lost to the container before they can plug it into whatever generator they put this thing in.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: They put it in the EnergyMaster-3000, _it holds it in a stasis with this rather incredible techno-... _My emotion module is telling me you don't care?

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Well at least we know that part of you works.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: Lets get closer to the surface, too much interference down here.
